item.title: ApplicationDataTarget
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.IO Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6 public enum ApplicationDataTarget : Enum Base types Enum Gets the application data target. Fields Machine 2 The machine. UserLocal 0 The user. UserRoaming 1 The user.

item.title: Path

item.title: StreamExtensions
